name: Stitch Vs Stitch fighterz!
description:
(stitch vs stitch fighterz!)                                                                                                                                                       

arrow keys to move. e or x to attack. up arrow to jump!

                                    all the minigames

 Game 1: faint stitch with a sword

Game 2: faint stitch with punching gloves

Game 3: do parkour without touching the spikes or falling of

Game 4: craft and smelt the bow to shoot the cpus tank

i made this because my classmates in school give me some ideas for this game and this how it become and it's pretty cool!
